text: We all have an interest in making sure teens grow up healthy and drug-free.
author: John Walters

text: I'd just as soon stay home and raise babies.
author: June Allyson

text: Mama and Daddy King represent the best in manhood and womanhood, the best in a marriage, the kind of people we are trying to become.
author: Coretta Scott King

text: My mom's a Catholic, and my dad's a Jew, and they didn't want anything to do with anything.
author: Isabelle Huppert

text: There are some great questions to ask your doctor. If he says 'no,' then you find yourself a different doctor. There really has to be a change in how we medically look at women at this time. I mean, this is not just baby gloom.
author: Marie Osmond
